\newcommand{\ottterm}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{term}  ,\ \ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{r}  ,\ \ottnt{s}  ,\ \ottnt{n}}{::=}{\ottcom{term}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\mathit{x}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{contra} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \mathit{x}  :  \ottnt{T} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{unary functions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function application}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Box \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{past necessity functor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Diamond \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{past possibility functor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\blacksquare \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{necessity functor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathbin{\blacklozenge} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{possibility functor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} : \ottnt{T}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{past necessity elim}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} : \ottnt{T}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{necessity elim}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\,\Diamond  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} : \ottnt{T}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{past possibility elim}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\,\blacklozenge  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  : \ottnt{T}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{possibility elim}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottform}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{form}  ,\ \ottnt{type}  ,\ \ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{T}}{::=}{\ottcom{formula and type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\perp}{}{}{}{\ottcom{false or the empty type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Box \, \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{past necessity}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{necessity}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Diamond \, \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{past possibility}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathbin{\blacklozenge} \, \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{possibility}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \to  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{implication}}}

\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{formula el}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{typed el}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma'}{}{}{}{\ottcom{append}}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleLXXax}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruleLXXaxName}{}%
}}

}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXimpIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_impI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXimpI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash   \lambda  \mathit{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \to  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXimpIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXimpEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_impE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXimpE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \to  \ottnt{B}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXimpEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXboxIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_boxI}}

\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \Box \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \Box \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXboxIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXboxEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_boxE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXboxE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \Box \, \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \mathit{x} : \Box \, \ottnt{A}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXboxEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXbboxIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_bboxI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXbboxI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \blacksquare \, \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXbboxIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXbboxEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_bboxE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXbboxE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \mathit{x} : \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdruletyXXbboxEName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdiaIName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_diaI}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdiaI}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad   M \in \{\Diamond, \mathbin{\blacklozenge} \} }%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruletyXXdiaIName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdiaEName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ty\_diaE}}
\newcommand{\ottdruletyXXdiaE}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A}   \quad  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{B}    \quad   M \in \{\Diamond, \mathbin{\blacklozenge} \} }%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\mathbin{M}  \mathit{x} :  \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A}   =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{:}   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruletyXXdiaEName}{}%
}}

%% defn eq
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \lambda  \mathit{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_box}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \emptyset  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \mathit{x} : \Box \, \ottnt{A}  =  \Box \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \approx  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXbboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_bbox}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXbbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \emptyset  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \mathit{x} : \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}  =  \blacksquare \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \approx  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXbboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXdiaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_dia}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXdia}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{B}     \quad   M \in \{\Diamond, \mathbin{\blacklozenge} \} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\mathbin{M}  \mathit{x} :  \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A}   =   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \approx  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXdiaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXcboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_cbox}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXcbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \Box \, \ottnt{C} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{C} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \Box \, \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \mathit{x} : \Box \, \ottnt{A}  =   \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \mathit{y} : \Box \, \ottnt{C}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \approx   \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \mathit{y} : \Box \, \ottnt{C}  =  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\,  \mathsf{let}\,\Box  \mathit{x} : \Box \, \ottnt{A}  =  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{3}}}}    :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXcboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXcbboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_cbbox}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXcbbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \blacksquare \, \ottnt{C} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{C} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \mathit{x} : \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}  =   \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \mathit{y} : \blacksquare \, \ottnt{C}  =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \approx   \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \mathit{y} : \blacksquare \, \ottnt{C}  =  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\,  \mathsf{let}\,\blacksquare  \mathit{x} : \blacksquare \, \ottnt{A}  =  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{3}}}}    :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXcbboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXcdiaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_cdia}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXcdia}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{C}  }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \mathit{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{C}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A}    \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \mathit{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{B}     \quad   M \in \{\Diamond, \mathbin{\blacklozenge} \} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\,\mathbin{M}  \mathit{x} :  \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A}   =   \mathsf{let}\,\mathbin{M}  \mathit{y} :  \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{C}   =  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   \approx   \mathsf{let}\,\mathbin{M}  \mathit{y} :  \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{C}   =  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\,  \mathsf{let}\,\mathbin{M}  \mathit{x} :  \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{A}   =  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{3}}}}    :   \mathbin{M}  \ottnt{B}  }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXcdiaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXreflName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_refl}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXrefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \approx  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXreflName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXsymName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_sym}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXsym}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXsymName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXtransName}[0]{\ottdrulename{eq\_trans}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleeqXXtrans}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
 \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleeqXXtransName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefneq}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} ; \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} ; \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \approx  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXbbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXdia{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXcbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXcbbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXcdia{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXrefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXsym{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleeqXXtrans{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtype}{
\ottdefnform{}\ottdefntype{}\ottdefneq{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJtype
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}

\begin{document}
\ottall

\begin{verbatim}
Definition rules:        36 good    0 bad
Definition rule clauses: 67 good    0 bad
\end{verbatim}
